projects.longDescription: Tango AR is the second version of Lite AR, which is my bachelor graduation project. The optics is designed to be cheap and easy to source for DIYers. The ID design is comfortable and elegant. With the help of Tango technology, this could be the most affordable yet very powerful AR headset in this world.
projects.role: Designeer of optics, software and ID

mainProjects.title: Star Wars: Jedi Challenge
mainProjects.subtitle: The world’s first and best-selling consumer AR headset
mainProjects.desc:
Project Management
2016-2017
I was the project manager of Star Wars: Jedi Challenge, which was sold more than 700,000 units world wide. After the initial success, the product line had successors like the dark side expansion pack and Marvel: Power United.

mainProjects.title: Holo Museum
mainProjects.subtitle: An interactive MR experience that brings nature to you
mainProjects.desc:
Producer, Developer, Interaction Designer
2019
Holo Museum is an educational MR experience for younger people. There are four chapters (Ocean Dream, Dinosaur World, Forest Fantasy and Space Exploration) now and growing. It was shown at Siggraph 2020 Immersive Pavilion and sold to more than 100 stores and counting.

smallProjects.title: Watch AR
smallProjects.subtitle: What can a 6 DoF tracked watch add to AR interaction?
smallProjects.desc:
Interaction Researcher, Designer & Prototyper
2019
Watch AR explored the potential of a 6 DoF tracked smart watch for AR interactions. It was demonstrated on ISMAR'19. ISMAR is the world’s top conference in MR/AR area. The paper can be found here.

smallProjects.title: Secret of Mars AR
smallProjects.subtitle: Explore mars inside and out in your living room
smallProjects.desc:
Interaction Design & Research . UI Design . Hi-Fi Prototyping
2017
Secret of Mars is a mobile AR experience which I worked on during my times in Huawei UCD, 2012 Laboratory. In this educational app, users can explore the galaxy and mars in their room. Users can penetrate the red planet to learn more about its inner structure. Everything they found during the journey will be stored in the collection page where they can find more detailed knowledge.

smallProjects.title: Blaster Craze MR
smallProjects.subtitle: The world’s first local co-op shooting in MR. Acquired by NetEase
smallProjects.desc:
Interaction Designer & Game Designer
2019
Blaster Craze is the world’s first local multiplayer shooter with MR technology. In a 4*7.5 m sci-fi arena, four players shoot each other to fight for victory. Audience can witness the competition through a mixed reality spectator view.
It was initiated by us at the beginning of 2019 and acquired by NetEase in August. NetEase is the second largest game company in China.
